::Savanna::

She had her commlink open for Phobia to answer.  But she had a gut 
feeling that something was approching that she couldn't see yet.  She 
felt her body tense up.  She wanted to transform into her lioness 
mode, thought better of it.  That action might make Phobia think she 
as an agresser, when she wasn't.  Not yet anyway.  She kept a sharp 
eye out on the horizon, but saw nothing out of the ordinary.  She 
listened on her commlink for an answer to her question.
